events.title: High Latency Detected in Payment API
events.text:
Payment API latency has exceeded the warning threshold of 500ms. Current average response time: 735ms.

System: Payment Processing
Affected Service: Payment API Gateway
Transaction Volume: 124/min
Error Rate: 0%
Impact: Potential delays in payment processing
SLA Status: At Risk (99.92% current)
Current Response Time: 735ms
Threshold: 500ms
